member.name: T:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.FindBillNumber
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Select 1 From [dbo].[PatientBills] Where LTrim(RTrim(BillNo)) = @BillNo.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.GetAllPatientBills
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT a.Id,a.BillNo,a.PatientId,a.PaymentDateTime as InvoiceDate,a.PaymentMode,a.TotalAmount,a.Status FROM PatientBills a,Patients b where a.PatientId=b.Id AND b.FirstName=@FirstName ORDER BY a.CreateDate DESC.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.GetPatientBillById
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT c.Id,b.CreateDate as TransactionDate,d.Name as ServiceName,d.Amount,a.PatientTransactionId FROM PatientBillTransactions a JOIN PatientTransactions b on a.PatientTransactionId=b.Id JOIN ServiceTransactions c on a.ServiceTransactionId=c.Id JOIN Services d on c.ServiceID=d.Id WHERE a.PatientBillId=@BillId ORDER BY b.CreateDate DESC.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.GetPatientBillDetailsById
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT * FROM PatientBills WHERE Id=@Id.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.GetPatientReceiptById
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT B.Id,B.PatientBillId,A.DiscountAmount,A.TotalAmount,A.InvoiceDate,A.PaymentMode,C.FirstName,C.MiddleName,C.Lastname,C.Mobile,C.Gender,C.Age,D.DepositAmount ,E.FirstName as DoctorFname,E.LastName as DoctorLname FROM PatientBills A JOIN PatientBillTransactions B ON B.PatientBillId=A.Id JOIN Patients C ON C.Id = A.PatientId JOIN PatientTransactions D ON D.Id = B.PatientTransactionId LEFT JOIN Doctors E ON E.Id=D.RefDocId WHERE A.Id=@BillId AND A.PatientId=@PatientId.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.SaveBillChequeDetails
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO BillChequeDetails(BillId,ChequeNo,ChequeDate,IFSCCode,BankName,CreateDate,CreateBy) VALUES(@BillId,@ChequeNo,@ChequeDate,@IFSCCode,@BankName,@CreateDate,@CreateBy).

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.SavePatientBill
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to insert into PatientBills(BillNo,PatientId,TotalAmount,DiscountPercentage,DiscountAmount,Status,IsCancel,PaymentMode,PaymentDateTime,InvoiceDate,CreateDate,CreateBy,Remarks) values (@BillNo,@PatientId,@TotalAmount,@DiscountPercentage,@DiscountAmount,@Status,@IsCancel,@PaymentMode,@PaymentDateTime,@InvoiceDate,@CreateDate,@CreateBy,@Remarks); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.SavePatientBillTransctions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO PatientBillTransactions(PatientBillId,PatientTransactionId,ServiceTransactionId,CreateDate,CreateBy) VALUES(@PatientBillId,@PatientTransactionId,@ServiceTransactionId,@CreateDate,@CreateBy).

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.UpdatePatientBill
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to update PatientBills set BillNo=@BillNo, TotalAmount=@TotalAmount,DiscountPercentage=@DiscountPercentage, DiscountAmount=@DiscountAmount, Status=@Status,IsCancel=@IsCancel,PaymentMode=@PaymentMode, Remarks=@Remarks, UpdateDate=@UpdateDate,UpdateBy=@UpdateBy where Id=@Id.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientBill.UpdatePatientBillStatus
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UPDATE PatientTransactions SET BillGenerated=1 WHERE Id=@PatientTransactionId.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.DeleteTransactionById
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DELETE FROM PatientTransactions WHERE Id=@Id.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.DeleteTransactionServiceByTrasId
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DELETE FROM ServiceTransactions WHERE PatientTransactionId=@Id.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.GetAllPatientTransactions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT SUM(c.Amount) AS TotalAmount, a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks FROM PatientTransactions a JOIN Patients b on a.PatientId=b.Id JOIN ServiceTransactions c on a.Id = c.PatientTransactionId GROUP BY a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks HAVING a.PatientId = @PatientId ORDER BY a.CreateDate D [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.GetAllPatientUnpaidTransactions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT SUM(c.Amount) AS TotalAmount, a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks FROM PatientTransactions a JOIN Patients b on a.PatientId=b.Id JOIN ServiceTransactions c on a.Id = c.PatientTransactionId GROUP BY a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks HAVING a.PatientId = @PatientId AND a.BillGenerated = 0 [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.GetBillNoForTransction
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to select value from Settings where Name='BillPrefix'.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.GetDepositeAmountById
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to select DepositAmount from PatientTransactions where Id=@Id.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.GetPatientTransactionsById
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT c.Id as ServiceTransaction_Id, b.Id as ServiceTransaction_ServiceId,a.CategoryName as ServiceTransaction_SCategory,b.Name as ServiceTransaction_SName,b.Amount as ServiceTransaction_SAmount,C.PatientTransactionId AS Service_PatientTransactionId FROM ServiceCategory a,Services b,ServiceTransactions c where c.PatientTransactionId=@TransactionsId AND A.Id=B.CategoryId AND B.Id=C.ServiceID.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.GetPatientTransctionForBill
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to select b.Id,b.CreateDate as TransactionDate,c.Name as ServiceName,b.Amount,b.PatientTransactionId from PatientTransactions a join ServiceTransactions b on a.Id=b.PatientTransactionId join Services c on c.Id=b.ServiceID where a.BillGenerated=0 and a.Id=@Id.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.GetTransactionDetailsById
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT * FROM PatientTransactions WHERE Id=@Id.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO ServiceTransactions(ServiceID, Amount, PatientTransactionId, CreateDate, CreateBy) VALUES(@ServiceID, @Amount, @PatientTransactionId, @CreateDate,@CreateBy); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.SavePatientTBillTransctions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO PatientBillTransactions(PatientBillId,PatientTransactionId,ServiceTransactionId,CreateDate,CreateBy) VALUES(@PatientBillId,@PatientTransactionId,@ServiceTransactionId,@CreateDate,@CreateBy).

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.SavePatientTransction
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO PatientTransactions(DepositAmount, SampleRequired, SampleReceived, SampleNumber,BillGenerated,RefDocId, PatientId,CreateDate, CreateBy,Remarks) VALUES(@DepositAmount,@SampleRequired, @SampleReceived, @SampleNumber,@BillGenerated, @RefDocId, @PatientId, @CreateDate, @CreateBy,@Remarks) ; SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.SavePatientTransctionBill
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to insert into PatientBills(BillNo,PatientId,PatientTransactionId,TotalAmount,DiscountPercentage,DiscountAmount,Status,IsCancel,PaymentMode,PaymentDateTime,CreateDate,CreateBy,Remarks) values (@BillNo,@PatientId,@PatientTransactionId,@TotalAmount,@DiscountPercentage,@DiscountAmount,@Status,@IsCancel,@PaymentMode,@PaymentDateTime,@CreateDate,@CreateBy,@Remarks); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.UpdateBillNoForTransction
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to update Settings set Value=@Value where Name='BillPrefix'.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.UpdatePatientServices
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UPDATE ServiceTransactions SET ServiceID=@ServiceID, Amount=@Amount, PatientTransactionId=@PatientTransactionId, UpdateDate=@UpdateDate, UpdateBy=@UpdateBy WHERE Id=@Id.

member.name: P:ProLab.Data.My.Resources.PatientTransction.UpdatePatientTransaction
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UPDATE PatientTransactions SET DepositAmount=@DepositAmount, SampleRequired=@SampleRequired , SampleReceived=@SampleReceived, SampleNumber=@SampleNumber, BillGenerated=@BillGenerated, RefDocId=@RefDocId,PatientId=@PatientId, UpdateDate=@UpdateDate, UpdateBy=@UpdateBy , Remarks=@Remarks WHERE Id=@Id ; SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();.
